title: Cold Platters for Christmas and New Year: Amazing Grazing Festive Fare to Share
description: A successful party or social event centers around food, and these cold platters for Christmas and New Year are the ideal way to bring the family together. What’s more, cold platters are the perfect way to allow your guests to indulge in all their favorite foods. Festive food to share means you get to enjoy new and exciting culinary combinations. From cured meats to fresh seafood, dried nuts to seasonal fruit, and decadent chocolate to artisan cheeses, check out these 40 sweet and savory cold platter recipes, • Sausage Platter with Beer Dipping Mustard • Turkey and Cranberry Pinwheel Platter • Christmas Eve Breakfast Platter • Smoked Mackerel Pâté and Potato Salad Platter • Candy Cane-Style Caprese Salad Platter • Tomato and Whipped Feta Crostini Platter • Christmas Candy Truffle Platter with Caramel Marshmallow Dip • Pavlova Grazing Platter It’s time to do some amazing grazing and take your Christmas or New Year spread to the next level with these 40 cold platter inspirations.
author: Christina Tosch
